name: Hydric Media
tagline: We Build Digital Products People Love
description:
Hydric is a technology-focused digital product agency specializing in products that delight, fascinate and touch millions of people. 
 
Our current clientele includes Viacom, Spotify, Refiinery29, Emirates, Northwestern Mutual, Reebok, among many other industry leaders. Our team's capabilities range from native mobile and web application development to augmented reality and machine learning.
 
Want to work with us? About to start a new project?
Or maybe you just wanna chat. Shoot us an email or give us a call. Yyou can find us in NYC and Brisbane, Australia.
